mapper.select: select userId, userName, userPwd, userSex, userMail, date_format(createTime,'%Y-%M-%d %T') createTime, date_format(lastUpdateTime,'%Y-%M-%d %T') lastUpdateTime from sys_user where userId = #{userId}
select userName, userPwd from sys_user info where info.userName=#{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( userName, userPwd, userSex, userMail )values ( #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{userSex}, #{userMail} )
